roles.title: Senior Frontend Engineer - Day One Journal
roles.introHtml: Senior frontend engineer building user-centric features for Day One Journal's popular journaling application. Delivered fast, intuitive web experiences focusing on product strategy and user experience, while leveraging modern frontend technologies to ship impactful features.
roles.descriptionHtml: Built user-first features for widely-used journaling platform, blending engineering with product strategy and UX considerations. Delivered performant, scalable frontend solutions with measurable user impact.

roles.title: Senior Frontend Engineer - Tumblr
roles.introHtml: Delivered high-impact frontend features for Tumblr's massive social media platform as part of Automattic's engineering organization. Built scalable, performant web applications serving millions of users, contributing to the evolution of one of the web's most iconic platforms.
roles.descriptionHtml: Developed features for high-traffic social media platform, building user-centric solutions at massive scale. Contributed to Automattic's product ecosystem (WordPress.com, WooCommerce), shipping performant, clean code for millions of daily users.

roles.title: Tech Lead - CRM Platform
roles.introHtml: Led and mentored frontend engineering teams at Carlsberg Group, establishing microfrontend architecture supporting multiple products and teams. Drove technical leadership across the organization, implementing AWS Lambda serverless solutions and CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions.
roles.descriptionHtml: Led multiple frontend teams in enterprise environment, architecting and implementing microfrontend framework for scalable product development. Integrated AWS Lambda functions for serverless architecture, established CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, and mentored engineers while driving frontend best practices across teams.

roles.title: Frontend Engineer - CRM Platform
roles.introHtml: Engineered an offline-ready Progressive Web Application for Carlsberg's multi-billion-dollar e-commerce platform. Delivered cutting-edge web solutions using React and GraphQL, ensuring optimal performance and user experience across distributed systems.
roles.descriptionHtml: Built offline-capable PWA for major e-commerce operations, implementing React and GraphQL stack for scalable frontend architecture. Delivered high-performance web application for global beverage brand.

roles.title: Frontend Engineer
roles.introHtml: Drove frontend development for Bynder's SaaS digital asset management platform, building scalable integrations and core product features. Leveraged modern JavaScript ecosystem to deliver high-performance web applications for enterprise clients.
roles.descriptionHtml: Developed integrations and new features for Bynder's core SaaS product, building enterprise-grade frontend solutions using React and TypeScript. Implemented GraphQL architecture for efficient data management, contributing to widely-used digital asset management platform.

roles.title: Lead Web Developer
roles.introHtml: Led web development initiatives for Cancer Research UK's digital fundraising platform. Directed technical strategy and implementation for mission-critical healthcare technology solutions, managing complex integrations and driving platform innovation.
roles.descriptionHtml: Led development of CRUK's in-house fundraising platform, architecting Drupal-based solutions with custom web services. Built donation feed feature integrating payment processing services, delivering seamless user experiences for charitable fundraising pages.

roles.title: Full-stack Developer
roles.introHtml: Served as Lead Web Developer for the Disasters Emergency Committee (DEC) website, managing end-to-end development and integration of critical payment processing systems. Led technical implementation of high-stakes fundraising platform requiring reliability and security.
roles.descriptionHtml: Led development of DEC.org.uk fundraising platform, integrating Stripe and PayPal payment systems for charitable donations. Implemented Embedly API for enhanced content functionality.

roles.title: Full-stack Developer
roles.introHtml: Led full-stack development and maintenance of Drupal-based web platforms for a leading ticketing company. Architected and delivered middleware solutions and standalone applications, showcasing versatility across the technology stack.
roles.descriptionHtml: Custom development and maintenance of high-traffic e-commerce websites, designing and building middleware and standalone applications. Delivered scalable solutions for ticketing industry web technologies.

roles.title: Web Developer
roles.introHtml: Developed and maintained HP intranet websites worldwide, delivering custom web-based solutions for internal use. Analyzed project requirements and client requests across global HP teams, demonstrating strong communication and requirement gathering skills.
roles.descriptionHtml: Built custom web-based projects for HP's internal operations, maintaining enterprise-level intranet infrastructure globally. Collaborated with international stakeholders on technical requirements.
